thread.title: Time to Bet on Halliburton by Buying Shares in Baker Hughes
thread.title_full: Time to Bet on Halliburton by Buying Shares in Baker Hughes - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Time to Bet on Halliburton by Buying Shares in Baker Hughes
text:
It seemed like a good idea at the time.
The bottom was dropping out of the energy market and oil-field-services giant Halliburton Co. decided to turn adversity into opportunity. Last November, it pounced on competitor Baker Hughes Inc. to form a proposed entity that would rival industry top dog Schlumberger Ltd. in size and scope.
